TopicTitle: Readouts go NaN when going higher than ~85degrees north at moho

Articles.Content:
I sent a rocket to moho to observe the giant hole at the north pole and upon getting to above 85 latitude on moho all readouts changed to either 0.0 or NaN. The rocket and terrain also disappeared.

I do not know if this occurs at other planets but I would like to understand why this happened. I tested this with the same rocket multiple times and the same thing happened.

Edited April 22, 2016 by CaptainNerdica
I can't reproduce this, are you using any mods?
